TopicTitle: More aeroplane content. New Kerbestrial sites with respect to missions.

Articles.Content:
Personall yI think that the aircraft portion of the game could use some more content. Sure you can build an aeroplane, but there isn't anywehre to go. Sure you can build a shuttle or spaceplane, but its way easier to just build another rocket.

Perhaps if there were another ground site or two, doesn't have to be a full space centre, they could just be small towns or whatever. - alternatively, they could be full KSC clones, or perhaps rearranging the building wouldn't take too much effort?

Then you could have missions/contracts such as "transport 20 kerbals from site A to site B", and other, more imaginative assignments.

Thoughts?

Any other ways to increase aeroplane content?
